title: Bug 14559Editor Action Toolbars acting strangely with Java Browsing Perspective
description: Not sure if this is UI or JDT.Build 20020418.1. Open a Java Perspective.2. Define a new project and package.3. Define two new classes.Test1 and Test2.Close Test2 editor.4. Open a Java Browsing perspective.Close Test1.Editor toolbar goes away(expected).5.Double click on Test2.Editor toolbar appears (expected).6.Close Test2.Editor toolbar does not go away (unexpected).7.Switch back to Java Perspective and then back to Java Browsing Perspective.8.Double click on Test1.Editor toolbar does not appear (unexpected).
